page.name: Xan's Volcano Fortress
page.description: You and Warlic have set out to capture the Pyronomicon and right from under Xan's flaming nose... but not everything runs according to plan.

properties.name: Xan's Volcano Fortress
properties.description: You and Warlic have set out to capture the Pyronomicon and right from under Xan's flaming nose... but not everything runs according to plan.
properties.complete: You have defeated the insane pyromancer, Xan and the powerful tome called the Pyromonicon is safe in Warlic's hands. But was that the end of Xan? Could his mastery of fire protect him from the lava? Only time will tell.

page.name: Elemental Essence
page.description: This crystal shard is a pure fragment of elemental essence. Bring this and one of the metal weapons (found in the elemental quests) to Warlic to enchant in his elemental SHOP.

properties.name: Elemental Essence
properties.description: This crystal shard is a pure fragment of elemental essence. Bring this and one of the metal weapons (found in the elemental quests) to Warlic to enchant in his elemental SHOP.
